welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kota Bharu, a charming city known for its vibrant market, rich cultural heritage, and delicious local cuisine. We hope you enjoy your time here and have a wonderful experience exploring all that Kota Bharu has to offer.

restaurants.name: Restoran Barakah Al-Haramain
restaurants.description: Restoran Barakah Al-Haramain is a halal restaurant located in Kota Bharu.
restaurants.address: Jalan Pintu Geng, Kota Bharu, Kelantan
